div.iframe: This iframe contains the logic required to handle Ajax powered Gravity Forms.
div.script: jQuery(document).ready(function($){gformInitSpinner( 1468788070, 'https://www.kippdc.org/wp-content/plugins/gravityforms/images/spinner.gif' );jQuery('#gform_ajax_frame_1468788070').on('load',function(){var contents = jQuery(this).contents().find('*').html();var is_postback = contents.indexOf('GF_AJAX_POSTBACK') >= 0;if(!is_postback){return;}var form_content = jQuery(this).contents().find('#gform_wrapper_1468788070');var is_confirmation = jQuery(this).contents().find('#gform_confirmation_wrapper_1468788070').length > 0;var is_redirect = contents.indexOf('gformRedirect(){') >= 0;var is_form = form_content.length > 0 && ! is_redirect && ! is_confirmation;var mt = parseInt(jQuery('html').css('margin-top'), 10) + parseInt(jQuery('body').css('margin-top'), 10) + 100;if(is_form){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_1468788070').html(form_content.html());if(form_content.hasClass('gform_validation_error')){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_1468788070').addClass('gform_validation_error');} else {jQuery('#gform_wrapper_1468788070').removeClass('gform_validation_error');}setTimeout( function() { /* delay the scroll by 50 milliseconds to fix a bug in chrome */ jQuery(document).scrollTop(jQuery('#gform_wrapper_1468788070').offset().top - mt); }, 50 );if(window['gformInitDatepicker']) {gformInitDatepicker();}if(window['gformInitPriceFields']) {gformInitPriceFields();}var current_page = jQuery('#gform_source_page_number_18').val();gformInitSpinner( 1468788070, 'https://www.kippdc.org/wp-content/plugins/gravityforms/images/spinner.gif' );jQuery(document).trigger('gform_page_loaded', [1468788070, current_page]);window['gf_submitting_1468788070'] = false;}else if(!is_redirect){var confirmation_content = jQuery(this).contents().find('.GF_AJAX_POSTBACK').html();if(!confirmation_content){confirmation_content = contents;}setTimeout(function(){jQuery('#gform_wrapper_1468788070').replaceWith(confirmation_content);jQuery(document).scrollTop(jQuery('#gf_1468788070').offset().top - mt);jQuery(document).trigger('gform_confirmation_loaded', [1468788070]);window['gf_submitting_1468788070'] = false;}, 50);}else{jQuery('#gform_1468788070').append(contents);if(window['gformRedirect']) {gformRedirect();}}jQuery(document).trigger('gform_post_render', [1468788070, current_page]);} );} );

jQuery(document).bind('gform_post_render', function(event, formId, currentPage){if(formId == 1468788070) {} } );jQuery(document).bind('gform_post_conditional_logic', function(event, formId, fields, isInit){} );

p.span: KIPP DC Somerset College Preparatory opened in 2019-20. KIPP DC Somerset College Preparatory is a welcoming, positive high school founded on the guiding principles Learn, Live, and Lead. We nurture and celebrate every student and family; we prepare our students for college, careers, and choice-filled lives. We strive every day to be consistent and kind. We commit to building a strong, diverse community where everyone feels a sense of belonging.

hr.h3: In summer 2019 KIPP DC began a partnership with Somerset Prep DC Public Charter School. Below are of helpful links for former Somerset Prep staff, students, and vendor:
hr.p: Student Record & Enrollment Questions – Kristine Ras
Vendors & Accounts Payable Questions– Shawn Stewart
Former Somerset Employees Questions & Employment Verification Requests – Human Resources Team
Special Education, IEP, & 504 Plan questions – Michael Brown
If you have any general questions about KIPP DC’s partnership with Somerset Prep please email us at somerset@kippdc.org

p.em: "Here at KIPP DC Somerset College Prep, we couldn't be more excited to be partnering with KIPP DC in the 2019-20 school year."

div.p: Lauren Catalano, Principal, KIPP DC Somerset College Preparatory
At KIPP DC Somerset College Preparatory our goal is for 100% of students to graduate from high school prepared to enroll in and complete college.

hr.p: Students engage in a diverse curriculum of English, math, history, and science classes. Students also engage foreign languages, electives, and physical education courses.
Teachers partner with students and families to ensure students holistic needs are met.

div.p: 2019-20 extracurricular activities include: Drumline | EYL (arts & crafts class) | TAG (technology & advanced gaming) | Music Production | Hey Mr. DJ | Fitness on Fire | Arts & Crafts | Robotics (Wednesdays only) | Top Chef (Wednesdays only) | Hip Hop Dance | 411 Gardening | How to Become a Youtuber | Cheerleading | Basketball | Volleyball | Baseball | Dance | Forensic Science | Drama | Chess | Project Lit | Street Law | Student Government | Step | Art & Photography

p.strong: Beginning in 2019-20 KIPP DC Somerset College Preparatory will join the KIPP DC school community.
